summary: This document is an email chain from August 24, 2020, forwarding a Civilian Crime Report submitted by A. Lombardino. The report suggests that a prisoner possesses information about Jeffrey Epstein. The correspondence involves internal review and logging procedures for the submission.

persons.name: A. Lombardino
persons.context: Submitted a Civilian Crime Report suggesting a prisoner has information about Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Submission of Civilian Crime Report regarding Epstein
events.description: A Civilian Crime Report from A. Lombardino is forwarded internally, suggesting a prisoner possesses information about Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: A Civilian Crime Report submitted by A. Lombardino on August 24, 2020, suggests a prisoner has information about Jeffrey Epstein.
The report was forwarded internally for review, with instructions to log it.
The correspondence indicates the submission did not fit the usual form, so additional information might not be forthcoming.
